QuestData.Title: Bushwhacker
QuestData.Description: We are continuing the search for Thaelin's people, but these botani, they are a larger threat than we ever realized.$b$bTo infest their victims... monstrous.$b$bPlease, commander, if you find yourself in Evermorn Springs to our west, slay as many of those creatures as you can.$b$bStop them from committing such acts of horror. Bring them to justice.
QuestData.CompletionText: We had always revered the botani back in Shadowmoon. Now, I see them for the horror they can become.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, commander. At every turn you seem to demonstrate an efficiency with war that even our most seasoned exarchs might fight to be challenging.
